cross.datastructures.fragments
Interface IGroupFragment

All Superinterfaces:
IIterableFragment, java.lang.Iterable<IVariableFragment>
All Known Subinterfaces:
IExperiment, IExperiment1D, IExperiment2D, IFileFragment
All Known Implementing Classes:
Experiment1D, Experiment2D, FileFragment, ImmutableFileFragment, NamedGroupFragment
public interface IGroupFragment
extends IIterableFragment

Abstraction bundling a number of VariableFragments into one logical group.

Author:
Nils.Hoffmann@cebitec.uni-bielefeld.de
